alert.note: Alert for North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Scotts Bluff, southwestern Sioux, southeastern Niobrara and northern Goshen Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Jay Em to 14 miles northeast of Lingle to near Torrington. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lusk, Prairie Center, Jay Em, Rawhide Buttes, Henry, Van Tassell and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
